channel.title: Summon Pkz (source+client) [D-ARAB]
channel.description:
Download link is at the bottom of this Post.
General Features
Client.java size is now 963kb, was over 1.2mb before, cleaned a load of **** out of it. There are ALOT of handlers, and classes, If there wasn't, it would all be piled into the Client class. NPC Animations handled through A .CFG (Config) file, which makes it alot easier to use, and less codes to put it. One FULLY Working quest - Lost City. 10 Non-Combat skills are Handled. Half finished barrows. Shops added where they should be. FULLY Working 'Buy X' Option, only shows with my client (V6) i edited to get it right client below for download Combat Features
FULL Skulling, Skulls show fully with prayer too, With My V6 Client - Link is at bottom of Post. Full following - Right click & attacking. The 'Attack' right-click option does not show up unless you are in the Wilderness, or fight pits. Perfect Player Combat - NPC Combat is no-where near as good as Player, I focussed more on Player, since it used to be a PKing server. Melee hits, Hit when the emote hits the player. Blocking animations added. Full Vengeance. Almost all special attack's, including the Darj bow, and MSB (Magic ShortBow). Ranged hits are delayed - As they should be. Full Defence & Attack bonuses, against Melee Ranged, AND magic. Full Magic spells on NPC's, only half have been added on players. Full Wilderness levels, working with Magic too. Full smite. FULL Prayer. Full Void Ranged increases Ranged hits, Full Void melee increases melee hits. Full potions working, with level decreasing. Vengeance recoils almost perfectly. Working ring of recoil.
Pictures: [img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/skullpray.gif[/img]working skull prayers [img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/SUMMONPKZ.jpg[/img]defenders minigame [img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/SUMMONPKZ2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/magebowspec.gif[/img] working spec [img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/dmacespec.gif[/img] [img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/ddsspec.gif[/img] [img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/dbowspec.gif[/img] Server Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/OPFEVW2C Client Download Link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=W93NL0UB sorry for different websites todownload from but I got my brother to upload client and I uploaded the source sorry again
Have fun.

item.title: Summon Pkz (source+client) [D-ARAB]
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

duffeh:

who cares if its really a leach. he released it for us to use. at least hes nice enough

You’re in a classroom, writing a report. As soon as you finish, you get up to pee. Someone hops onto your computer and changes the name, prints it, and calls it his, and takes credit for it.
But who really cares if it’s stolen?

All he did was change the name of the server, and he’s wanting rep for it.

Read full topic
